entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow mixed with freezing rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Snow with freezing rain this morning and with drizzle this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High 6. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 8:49 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 6. POP 60%
